briefTitle: Lesinurad Monotherapy in Gout Subjects Intolerant to Xanthine Oxidase Inhibitors
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Multicenter, Placebo- Controlled Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Lesinurad Monotherapy Compared to Placebo in Subjects With Gout and an Intolerance or Contraindication to a Xanthine Oxidase Inhibitor
summary: This study will assess the serum uric acid lowering effects and safety of lesinurad compared to placebo in patients who are intolerant or have a contraindication to allopurinol or febuxostat.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With an sUA Level That is < 6.0 mg/dL
